basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Shivani Inamdar. Enthusiastic technical professional with complete understanding of entire software development lifecycle. Highly trained in ReactJS and NodeJS and known for having talents in presentation skills and debugging code. Also learned technologies such as Docker, Bootstrap, MaterialUI. I have been presented with 2 awards in my professional life due to my hard work and smart work that improved the performance of the application.

projects.title: AP1 - Developer Portal - Vodafone
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by my colleagues. Application handles creation, updation, deletion of API Keys and allows to store all data about the user and their team regading their API-Keys.

projects.title: Integration of Gutenberg Editor in ReactJs application
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!

projects.title: BookRunning UI - Barclays
projects.description: This application was a integral part of the Barclays investment banking domain. This application was developed using React JS as the frontend technology along with excessive use of HTML and CSS. The backend of this application was built using JAVA.
